typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as short,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as short,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'con1',
	fileName: 'EmpInfo.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> EmpInfoCSV
EmpInfoCSV derive(EmpID = toInteger(null()),
		EmpName = toString(null()),
		Dept = sha2(256, Dept)) ~> MaskingEncryption
MaskingEncryption alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		Column_1 = EmpID,
		Column_2 = EmpName,
		Column_3 = Gender,
		Column_4 = Salary,
		Dept
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmpInfoMasked
